short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily dose of inspiration brought to you by my favorite people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relaxing backgrounds and inspirational quotes to help you through your day.  When you download the extension, choose a theme, this is not currently set in stone as this is the beta version of the extension.   

Customize the extension in with the settings icon.
